responses: It seems like you have Hand, Foot, and Mouth Disease. You may need fluids to stay hydrated and pain relief for fever and discomfort.This condition is usually mild, but if symptoms worsen or if you experience difficulty swallowing, see a doctor immediately. Most cases resolve on their own, but if needed, a doctor can help with managing symptoms.

responses: It seems like you may have a viral skin rash. Depending on the type, treatments may vary.
